EnrollAccount: You have been added as a member of community __name__ with role: __role__.
Hereby you are invited to join the honline __communityType__ management system, where you can follow the community issues, discuss them and even vote online.
You can start enjoying all of the system's benefits as soon as you confirm your registration.
The following link takes you to our simple one click registration confirmation:

(You will be asked to set up a password for your account and you are ready to go) 
 __url__
If you think you have been added by accident, or in fact not want to be part of the community, you don't need to accept the invitation link.
You may also contact the __communityType__ administrator at __email__, to get more information.

Welcome to the age of online __communityType__ management! 

Honline team
email.VerifyEmailSubject: Verify your email address on Honline
VerifyEmail: You have been registered as a user in the Honline system with this email address.

To confirm your registration please click the link below: 

 __url__
If you think you have been added by accident, or in fact not want to register,
you don't need to do anything, and your account will be automatically deleted in a few days.
ResetPassword:
Hello,

Click the link below to reset your password on Honline:

__url__

If you didn't request this email, please ignore it.
AddedToRole: You have been added as a member of community __name__ with role: __role__.
You can visit the community at this link: __link__
If you think you have been added by accident, or in fact not want to be part of the community, please contact the community administrator at __email__.
email.DontReplyToThis: Please don't reply to this email, as it is sent by an automated system.
GenericFooter: If you believe this email was sent to you by mistake or you don't agree with its contents.
Please contact the community via the provided email, or contact the administrator.
email.OutstandingsPretext: According to our accounting, you have some unpaid bills towards the community.
email.OutstandingsCallToAction: Please pay this amount to the community within 8 days.
email.OutstandingsContact: If payment has already been made, in order to avoid further proceedings, please send to the community the payment slips, to the following email address
email.BillText: You have a new electronic bill, which can be viewed in detail and printed by logging into the system. Here you can also view your bill and payment history.
email.PaymentMethods: You may transfer the amount to this bank account
email.PaymentInstructions: Please provide the bill ID at the remarks.
BillFooter: You received this email, because in your settings you agreed to get notifications about your invoices in the community.
You can change your settings in your user profile at this link.

Should you have any questions, feel free to contact the community's administrator
.
PromoSignature: In case you have any questions, you can email us at info@honline.hu
email.PromoFooter: This letter was sent to the email address you provided during registration to inform you about the starting details. If you believe you have received this email by accident, please ignore it or write to info@honline.hu.
email.NotificationsHeader: The View button next to the topics will take you to that topic's page, where you can comment on it.
NotificationsFooter: You are receiving these notifications, because you have asked us to send you email notifications about the activities in your community __frequency__.
You can change your email notification settings or turn it off completely at this link.

Should you have any questions, feel free to contact the community's administrator
.
email.VoteClosesTitle: Attention! The following voting(s) below will be closing soon, and you have not yet voted on these issues. By clicking on the green button you may still do so for a couple of days. You may also set up a delegation and let someone else vote for you on this and on similar issues in the future.
ConfirmVoteText:
Dear __personName__,
Your vote has been registered on the voting '__voteTitle__' in __community__.
The question for voting:
__voteText__
Your vote:
__castedVote__
__registeredBy__
For more information about this voting, or to change your vote before the time of closing, you can visit this link:
__link__

This is an automatically generated email please do not reply.
In case you have any questions, feel free to contact the administrator of the community.
ConfirmDelegationText: Your delegation __methodType__ in __community__ on __date__ with the following data:
To see your currently active delegations, or to make changes to them, you can visit this link:
This is an automatically generated email please do not reply.
In case you have any questions, feel free to contact the administrator of the community.
email.delegationAcceptance: The delegatee accepts the delegation according to their settings in Honline.
email.delegationRemoved: The delegation above expired with date __date__.
